fileTooltips.newFile: Create a new file and reset default font and font size
fileTooltips.saveAs: Save the document as a text file

textTooltips.fontFamily: Change the font in the document or selected text
textTooltips.fontSize: Change the font size in the document or selected text
textTooltips.cut: Cut the selected text and copy it to the clipboard
textTooltips.copy: Copy the selected text to the clipboard
textTooltips.paste: Paste text from the clipboard into the document
textTooltips.selectAll: Select all text in the document
textTooltips.textColor: Change the text color or selected text color
textTooltips.backgroundColor: Change the background color of the document or selected text

messageboxTooltips.applicationContinue: Open the editor without using styles
messageboxTooltips.applicationCancel: Close the dialog and exit the application
messageboxTooltips.errorCopy: Copy the error message to the clipboard
